name: CHOLBAM 250 MG
treatmentDescriptions: • Cholbam is indicated for the treatment of inborn errors in primary bile acid synthesis due to Sterol 27-hydroxylase (presenting as cerebrotendinous xanthomatosis, CTX) deficiency, • 2- (or alfa - ) methylacyl-CoA racemase (AMACR) deficiency in infants, children and adolescents aged 1 month to 18 years and adults• Cholesterol 7 alfa - hydroxylase (CYP7A1) deficiency in infants, children and adolescents aged 1 month to 18 years and adults• 3β-hydroxy-5-C27-steroid oxidoreductase deficiency (also known as 3β-hydroxy-5-C27-steroid dehydrogenase/isomerase or 3β-HSD or HSD3β7.
warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לרישום ע'י רופא מומחה או הגבלה אחרת
